channel.title: Farming Bug
channel.description:
I coded Farming in my server a Week ago, but the Farming Skill doesn't make your Total Level go up when you get the skill up?
Is there anyway I can make it so when you Level up Farming it adds on to your Total Level?
Thanks

item.title: Farming Bug
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

try adding +playerLevel[21] since runecrafting is 20

Read full topic

item.title: Farming Bug
item.dc:creator: @Soul_Breaker Soul Breaker
item.description:
@Soul_Breaker wrote:

Hmm, that’s odd. Try finding other skills that make ur total level go up, and try copying it but just edit it a bit.

Read full topic

item.title: Farming Bug
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

Already have that…

int totallvl = playerLevel[0] + playerLevel[1] + playerLevel[2] + playerLevel[3] + playerLevel[4] + playerLevel[5] + playerLevel[6] + playerLevel[7] + playerLevel[8] + playerLevel[9] + playerLevel[10] + playerLevel[11] + playerLevel[12] + playerLevel[13] + playerLevel[14] + playerLevel[15] + playerLevel[16] + playerLevel[17] + playerLevel[18] + playerLevel[19] + playerLevel[20];

Read full topic

item.title: Farming Bug
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

totalz = (getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[1]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[2]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[4]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[7]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[8]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[9]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[10]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[0]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[11]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[12]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[13]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[14]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[15]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[6]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[17]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[18]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[19]) + getLevelForXP(playerXP[20]));

Something like this?,or don’t know.

Read full topic
